meanings.definition: A person or thing that retrieves.
meanings.sent1: The retrievers brought back the lost ball.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled retrievers of information.
meanings.sent3: The little retrievers kept finding hidden treasures in the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a retrievers, always bringing back the past.
meanings.sent5: The retrievers in the office always found misplaced documents.

meanings.definition: A breed of gun dog trained to retrieve game.
meanings.sent1: The retrievers were excellent at fetching ducks during hunting.
meanings.sent2: Many families enjoy having retrievers as loyal pets.
meanings.sent3: The retrievers in the competition were so focused on fetching.
meanings.sent4: The retrievers' determination to retrieve was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The retrievers' wagging tails showed their excitement to retrieve.
